Optional course: Choose 12 units from: APA3123, APA3142, APA4101, APA4112, APA4115, APA4120, LSR3105, LSR3116.
Optional course: Choose 3 units from PHI1101, PHI1370, PSY1101, PSY1102, SOC1101, SOC1106.
Choose 9 optional course units at the 3000 or 4000 level from the list of optional courses.
APA4200 or APA4211 is offered year-round and counts as 3 units per term. Deadline to enrol in APA4211 is June 30.
Contact Faculty of Health Sciences for clinical placement requirements.
Students in co-op may replace 6 units with 6 APA optional course units at 3000/4000 level.
You may add a 30-unit minor which replaces your 30 units of electives.
Following this sequence is important to graduate in 4 years. Any deviation may delay graduation.
Advanced standing students should contact the Academic Office to adjust their sequence.
